NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 POKE: The installation of the paired warp cores in the core of the Deep Storm Station is complete, my friends! 2 1 POKE: After the test, we will be able to study how conducting such vast quantities of energy may affect both warp cores, allowing us to better refine and improve the advanced warp core we are crafting for the Ash Twin Project. 3 1 CASSAVA: My deepest gratitude for your hard work, Poke. After the test is complete, could we perhaps.. repurpose these warp cores for building the warp pads connecting Giant's Deep to Ash Twin? 4 3 POKE: We could, since these warp cores have been paired. But it would be a waste of warp cores engineered to handle far stronger energy... Oh, you're just nagging me about Giant's Deep warp pad again. 5 4 POKE: Your helpful, daily, reminders are not needed, Cassava: the Black Hole Forge is already working as fast as it can! All I can do is promise that it is being worked on. DSS CONV4 1
